XMLDB.COMMENT: XMLDB file for Moodle Number of errors subplugin

TABLE.NAME: workshopform_numerrors
TABLE.COMMENT: The assessment dimensions definitions of Number of errors grading strategy forms

FIELD.NAME: sort
FIELD.COMMENT: Defines the dimension order within the assessment form

FIELD.NAME: descriptionformat
FIELD.COMMENT: The format of the description field

FIELD.NAME: grade0
FIELD.COMMENT: The word describing the negative evaluation (like Poor, Missing, Absent, etc.). If NULL, it defaults to a translated string False

FIELD.NAME: grade1
FIELD.COMMENT: A word for possitive evaluation (like Good, Present, OK etc). If NULL, it defaults to a translated string True

TABLE.NAME: workshopform_numerrors_map
TABLE.COMMENT: This maps the number of errors to a percentual grade for submission

FIELD.NAME: nonegative
FIELD.COMMENT: Number of negative responses given by the reviewer

FIELD.NAME: grade
FIELD.COMMENT: Percentual grade 0..100 for this number of negative responses

KEY.NAME: nonegative_uq
KEY.COMMENT: Number of negative must be unique within the given workshop
